body: i really want to get friends on my profile but idk how to i see popular users have friends and i h=just want to know how they do it
body_tagged: i really want to get friends on my profile but idk how to i see popular users have friends and i h=just want to know how they do it
title: How do i get friends

replies.body:
The "Add Friend" button hasn't been implemented yet, however, it will be in the next website update.

People have friends because they got them on the old website, when you could friend people.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
If you go to old.avicus.net I believe you can still friend people that way.

And netox_max found this out :P
